lines.text: let n , m , a be long integers
let mod be a long integer with mod = ( 1000000 ) + 3
let poww be a function that accepts long long x , long long y and returns a long integer value
lines.code: long long poww ( long long x , long long y )

lines.text: if y is equal to 0 , return 1
if y is equal to 1 , return x
if y modulo 2 , return the value of ( ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) modulo mod ) * ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) modulo mod ) * ( x modulo mod ) ) modulo mod
lines.code: if ( y % 2 ) return ( ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) % mod ) * ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) % mod ) * ( x % mod ) ) % mod ;

lines.text: return the value of ( ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) modulo mod ) * ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) modulo mod ) ) modulo mod
lines.code: return ( ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) % mod ) * ( poww ( x , y / 2 ) % mod ) ) % mod ;
